    BookControl - Class in org.Code
    Controls borrowing, fines, and user-related operations for books and other media in the library system.
    BookControl(Books) - Constructor for class org.Code.BookControl
    Creates a new BookControl with a given Books instance and a default empty MediaCollection.
    BookControl(Books, MediaCollection) - Constructor for class org.Code.BookControl
    Creates a new BookControl using the given Books and MediaCollection instances.
    Books - Class in org.Code

    borrowMedia(User, String) - Method in class org.Code.BookControl
